items.content_html: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
items.title: talentedaamer/javascript-confirm: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
